name: Force of Wheel
description:
Description

This game is meant to be played with two people at the same keyboard. You both start off as triangles, and compete in a series of simple minigames. If you win a minigame, your polygon gains one side. To win, get to 8 sides.

Note: This was made for Ludum Dare 36, whose theme was Ancient Technology. We originally brainstormed some ideas in which you started off as a triangle and eventually became a wheel (or circle), which turned into this. It doesn't relate much to the original theme, but you can imagine some backstory in which a bunch of shapes are competing to become the first wheel in a series of challenges. This is also the first game we've ever made, so we hope you have fun and would love any feedback.

Controls

Player 1/yellow polygon: WASD

Player 2/green polygon: arrow keys

If you're interested, the (very messy, poorly written) source code can be found here.
